title: Facultative reinsurance certificates
dataVerified: Ceding company, reinsurer, individual risk details, coverage terms, facultative premium
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake facultative certificates (claiming reinsurance that doesn't exist). Domain binding verifies reinsurer. High-value individual risks ($10M-$1B+ typical). Large property/casualty placements. Jumbo risk verification.
